column4: ive done something like that before, but was just my not realizing what computer i was logged into at the time. so i started changing my bash prompt color based ont he host
i did a 'reboot', and the friggin 'main server' went down, not the workstation i was sitting at (but was ssh'd to the main server)
yeah, hehe, thank god it was a weekend and nobody was around to catch me ;)
